label: [NodeDev] UglifyJS
info:
::: aim

Create a node that can uglify Javascript code.

:::

description: Uglify Javascript code. Based on the <a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/uglify-js">uglify-js<a> package.

name: README.md
template: # UglifyJS Simple node that using the ugilify-js package to minify Javascript code. The node calls `minify` passing the options defined in the nodes configuration.
